summary: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.
cast: Paul Newman|Fredric March|Richard Boone|Diane Cilento|Cameron Mitchell|Barbara Rush|Peter Lazer|Margaret Blye|Martin Balsam|Skip Ward|Frank Silvera|David Canary|Val Avery|Larry Ward|Linda Cordova|Pete Hernandez|Merrill C. Isbell
title: Un hombre
